projects: [{"title":"Thematic Research Group (GRT) in Coaching - Association Francophone de Gestion des Ressources Humaine (AGRH)","start_date":"May 2022"},{"title":"ICF Global - AI Coaching Standards working group","start_date":"Jun 2021"},{"title":"PFactory Startup","start_date":"Oct 2016","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"PFactory accelerates entrepreneurs and get along with startups to help them qualitatively fasttrack their journey from traction, to revenues and funding stages.PocketConfidant AI has been selected to join PFactory among other promising startups starting from France and going global."},{},{},{},{},{},{},{},{"title":"BizPark Microsoft","start_date":"Dec 2016","end_date":"Apr 2020"},{},{},{},{"title":"The Refiners - accelerator - San Francisco, USA","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Dec 2018","description":"The Refiners is a startup accelerator based in San Francisco."},{"title":"WeLoveStartups Oracle","start_date":"Dec 2016","end_date":"Dec 2018","description":"WeLoveStartups is a selective and digital innovation oriented startups program ran by Oracle in Paris and worldwide. PocketConfidant AI is happy to join one of the top IT companies in the world to perfect market insights, innovation acceleration and technology's future direction."},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Reises Farming","start_date":"Oct 2015","end_date":"Oct 2017","description":"Reises creates a network of existing and emerging farmers around regenerative agriculture in the Southern and Mountain region of France (French Riviera)."},{},{},{"title":"European Innovation Academy 2015","start_date":"Jul 2015","end_date":"Aug 2015","description":"The World's Largest Extreme Accelerator Focused on IT Innovations.Future entrepreneurs are immersed in a multicultural ecosystem of 700 students, speakers, mentors and venture capitalists from 65 different nationalities.EIA welcomes students & entrepreneurs from following disciplines: • Software Engineering• Design• Business & Economics• Marketing• Others (all entrepreneurial and innovation minded students!)"},{"title":"Hong Kong Startup Week end 6th edition April 2014","start_date":"Apr 2014","end_date":"Apr 2014","description":"Another great and fun event"},{"title":"Hong Kong Start Up Week End 5th edition November 2013","start_date":"Nov 2013","end_date":"Nov 2013","description":"Took part in a three people team. Projet was focused on building an ecommerce platform, aiming to match suppliers/wholesalers and buyers/retailers to give buyers the needed/wished MOQ, meanwhile respecting suppliers' MOQ. Low commissions, simple process, customer service and strong potential. Main contributions in the project: structure, focus, speed, execution lead and motivation."},{"title":"Hong Kong Start Up Week End 4th edition April 2013","start_date":"Apr 2013","end_date":"Apr 2013","description":"we targeted on solving the problem of reducing Empty-Loaded Rate. Different to the project European Union working on, the way we solve this problem is to activate both sides of supplements and demands. Our platform will be best way for truckers to find more goods info without worrying about their security. For shippers, we can guarantee their goods will be delivered safely and punctually. Matcha is a ultimate tool to break the geographic restriction, and provide goods info of all over china. Synchronously, Mathca will be the best friend of shippers, helping them find trusted, professional logistic service."},{},{},{},{},{},{"title":"South America Tour - 100 Days Backpacking","start_date":"Oct 2012","end_date":"Jan 2013","description":"A must have project. An opening on a range of various cultures, behaviors and beliefs. An enriching walk through exciting countries that contributed to fuel my social and observation competencies."}]

honors_and_awards.title: Mentor at Hult Prize At IHEC Sfax
honors_and_awards.description: The Hult Prize Foundation is a global learning platform that enables the new generation to deliver social change through education & entrepreneurship. In the context of the 2021 competition, I was invited to mentor a group of young entrepreneurs.

honors_and_awards.title: French Tech BPI France innovation grant 2017
honors_and_awards.description: Every year BPI France and French Tech recognize and support innovative startups.

honors_and_awards.title: Marketing Challenge Intern Award on Integrated Marketing strategies for global event
honors_and_awards.description: Interns have put together in two teams of 5 people to compete on a real business case in marketing strategy and integrated marketing strategy.
